headlines.description: — Arsenal lost in the Premier League for just the second time this season as Everton pulled off a surprising 1-0 win over the leaders on Saturday in its first match under new manager Sean Dyche.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal loses 1-0 at Everton for 2nd Premier League defeat

headlines.description: — Kelechi Iheanacho scored a goal and set up two others to help Leicester beat Aston Villa 4-2 on Saturday in the English Premier League.
headlines.shortLinkText: Iheanacho leads Leicester at Aston Villa to 4-2 victory

headlines.description: Brentford forward Bryan Mbeumo got a goal and an assist in their 3-0 home victory over bottom side Southampton in the Premier League on Saturday.

events.name: AFC Bournemouth at Brighton & Hove Albion

headlines.description: Kaoru Mitoma scored to help Brighton to a 1-0 win over relegation-threatened Bournemouth in a Premier League south-coast derby on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mitoma scores again to give Brighton late win

headlines.description: Manchester United climbed up to third place in the Premier League table with a 2-1 win over Crystal Palace at Old Trafford on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Man Utd edge Palace despite Casemiro red card

headlines.description: Liverpool suffered a 3-0 away defeat to Wolves on Saturday as their disappointing Premier League season continued.
headlines.shortLinkText: Liverpool slump continues in 3-0 loss to Wolves

events.name: West Ham United at Newcastle United

headlines.description: — Conceding for the first time in the English Premier League since November, Newcastle was held by West Ham to 1-1 on Saturday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newcastle's shutout run ends in 1-1 draw with West Ham
